title: Secret of the Khmer
description: Curtis and Minerva thought their troubles were behind them, and they could raise their children in peace. Things also seemed to look up for them when the two befriend Penelope O’Lorich, an orphan from Michigan, and Geoffrey Salisbury, the son of an archaeologist from England. But things spiral out of control when Sable Omri, the right-hand man of the late Warlock Blightonyx, plans to continue where his master left off! Paul, Deborah, Penelope, and Geoffrey travel with Acorn, advisor of Minerva’s family, into the Shang-Saigon Coast and the jungles of war-ravaged Vietnam, where an ancient weapon lies—one that Sable Omri plans to unleash!
author: Danny Wheeler
